name: Keep Calm & Breathe
description:
In an ancient time,

Where mafia ruled the world, you were at the top of it, spoiled by abudant wealths, womens, feasts... You had everything you ever dreamed of.

Untill that day, where your old enemy is catching you back... To get what you took from him.. 

HIS RIGHT TO LIVE.

Trapped on a cargo, locked into a container and dropped in the sea, you'll have to try your best to survive until you hit the abyssal ground.. and die -alone- (Probably).

Your -now- best friend is the one you didn't gave a shit about for so long.. OXYGEN!

And you'll need him, trust me ;)

Controls:

WASD: Character movements (Better smash your keys continuously)
Right arm controlled by mouse (Move the obstacle!).
With very much luck you can grab objects by left clicking them.

Good luck and have fun.

Update:  physics sort of fixed (was fps dependant).

Update2: Original jam version reupload as asked by the host.
